li.label: strong back
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a strong back which allows [PAWN_objective] to carry more than most people.

li.label: very strong back
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very strong back, [PAWN_pronoun] must be part mule or something because [PAWN_pronoun] can carry a lot more than most people.

li.label: bandolier
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bandolier. [PAWN_pronoun] likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.

li.label: enduring
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good health and an enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is better at handling stressful situations than others.

li.label: very enduring
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.

li.label: charismatic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and trading.

li.label: very charismatic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and trading.

li.label: intimidating
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] an advantage in social interactions.

li.label: very intimidating
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] a large advantage in social interactions.

li.label: poor aim
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target more often in combat.

li.label: steady aim
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.

li.label: great aim
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has great hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.

li.label: artisan
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys putting things together and [PAWN_pronoun]'s pretty good at it.

li.label: iron stomach
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an iron stomach. [PAWN_pronoun] can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset [PAWN_possessive] stomach.

li.label: packin' light
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] packs lightly. [PAWN_pronoun] will carry less but will move more swiftly.

li.label: pack rat
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a pack rat, [PAWN_pronoun] will keep just about anything in case it might be useful later.

li.label: agile
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good reflexes and moves with finesse. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.

li.label: ninja
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.

li.label: intelligent
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is more intelligent than average. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].

li.label: very intelligent
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very intelligent. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].

li.label: Perceptive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a good awareness of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a good understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.

li.label: very perceptive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a great understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.

li.label: dodgy
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at doging things. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.

li.label: evasive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at avading things. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.

li.label: scientific
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good researcher and a fast learner.

li.label: very scientific
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great researcher and a fast learner.

li.label: traveler
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at traveling. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.

li.label: explorer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at exploration. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.

li.label: adventurer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at adventuring. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.

li.label: bargainer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at bargaining. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.

li.label: hard bargainer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hard bargainer. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.

li.label: uninspiring
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an uninspiring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.

li.label: inspirational
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .

li.label: very inspirational
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.

li.label: generous
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should.

li.label: overly generous
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an overly generous person to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should

li.label: scrapper
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at working with scrap metal. [PAWN_pronoun] is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.

li.label: natural leader
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural leader, [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.

li.label: rad resistant
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.

li.label: rad tolerant
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.

li.label: action boy
li.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.

li.label: action girl
li.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.

li.label: quick hands
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has quick hands. When it comes to [PAWN_possessive] hands, [PAWN_nameDef] never hesitates.

li.label: gun nut
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a gun nut, [PAWN_pronoun] loves guns so much that [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.

li.label: scrounger
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see [PAWN_pronoun] eat!

li.label: sturdy frame
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a sturdy frame. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry more and it takes more to bring [PAWN_objective] down.

li.label: survivalist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is survialist. [PAWN_pronoun] has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.

li.label: blitz
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] finds the gap to make the tackle! [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.

li.label: philanthropist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a philanthropist. [PAWN_pronoun] is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.

li.label: healing hands
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on [PAWN_possessive] healing touch.

li.label: rooted
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part tree! It takes more to bring [PAWN_nameDef] down but also more to get [PAWN_objective] moving.

li.label: lead belly
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a lead belly. [PAWN_possessive] belly can go much longer without food and [PAWN_pronoun] is more resistant to toxic radiation.

li.label: bear arms
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has bear arms. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry more and [PAWN_possessive] arms pack more of a punch!

li.label: serendipitous
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is serendipitous, [PAWN_pronoun] seems to be a pretty lucky [PAWN_objective] and is pretty happy about it.

li.label: green thumb
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for gardening. [PAWN_pronoun] is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields while harvesting them.

li.label: tenderizer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tenderizer! [PAWN_pronoun] has a passion for beating meat into submission.

li.label: fortune finder
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to discover hidden wealth where ever [PAWN_pronoun] goes.

li.label: bountiful butcher
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bountiful butcher! [PAWN_pronoun] isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what [PAWN_pronoun] wants.

li.label: animal friend
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for animals. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. [PAWN_nameDef] refuses to hunt animals.

li.label: magnetic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow [PAWN_pronoun] able to use [PAWN_possessive] attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.

li.label: life giver
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have [PAWN_possessive]'s expertise keeping them alive.

li.label: spiritual healer
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a spiritual healer, [PAWN_pronoun] is a great doctor with good social skills. [PAWN_nameDef] loves to grow and make [PAWN_possessive] own medicine.

li.label: frail back
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.

li.label: ghoulish
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is still human, mostly. [PAWN_pronoun] is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but [PAWN_possessive] ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.

li.label: idiot savant
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't stupid! [PAWN_pronoun] is just... different. [PAWN_pronoun] works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. [PAWN_pronoun] is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.

li.label: stupid
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] can mess up doing just about anything.

li.label: oblivious
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings, or anything at all really. [PAWN_pronoun]

li.label: woodchucker
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part woodchuck! [PAWN_pronoun] wants everyone to believe [PAWN_possessive] great woodworking is because [PAWN_possessive] work ethic but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.

li.label: wrecking ball
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a wrecking ball! [PAWN_pronoun] can push through building material like it's not even there. [PAWN_pronoun] really doesn't know [PAWN_possessive] own strength, often breaking things during construction.

li.label: perfectionist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a perfectionist with a passion for art. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because [PAWN_pronoun] puts too much effort into making everything perfect.

li.label: iron fist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an iron fist! [PAWN_pronoun] can punch through foes like they are not even there. [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
